channel.title: uTorrent help?
channel.description: i recently tried to download warcraft 3 and i got a call from some guy sayin they might take away our internet wtf went on

item.title: uTorrent help?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

all sites like isohunt and them do is host link files, the site does not host any illegal files itself, regular ppl host the files on their pcs, at least thats what i think its like, kidna like gnutella, its p2p, no central hub, no way to stop ppl

Read full topic

item.title: uTorrent help?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

i can only say i doubt its because of the illegal part, if you got caught for ilegal downloading im sure i would have for now. i know someone(someone…lol…what you looking at… it wasnt me!) who has downloaded over 15,000 dollars in illegal programs…, not that i do it…, its probly because most isp’s that i know of have a limit to your bandwidth and warcraft 3 is fairly big, at least i think thats the same file i was gunna get, so you probly used up all of your alowd bandwidth

Read full topic

item.description:

pkmobb:

i recently tried to download warcraft 3 and i got a call from some guy sayin they might take away our internet wtf went on

That’s because your downloading a program illegally.

Unless you download shit loads, or unless you bragged about it to someone I don’t know if it’s fake or not.
